com.invoices.service

Class PdfService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invoices.service.PdfService

  • public class PdfService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for generating PDF files, based on an invoice. To create a pdf document, you have to call createPdf method.

    WARNING: Unicode characters, (i.e. currency symbols, or cyrillic script characters) are not supported by default in iText7 when creating a PDF file. A font that supports Windows-1251 8-bit character encoding is needed, to support Unicode standard characters and symbols.
    Author:
    psoutzis

      PageBackgroundEvent is an inner class, needed to add colour to the PDF pages.

    • Method Detail

      • sendBytesToBrowser

        public void sendBytesToBrowser(HttpServletResponse response,
                               java.lang.String filepath,
                               boolean storeOnServer)
        Method will create a File(), from the file-path it takes as input. It will write the bytes of the file to the output stream, so tha the user is prompted to download the file if he/she wishes to. The headers are initialized by the method, so the browser will expect a Pdf file. After the file is written to the http request's output stream, it will be deleted from the server.
        Parameters:
        response - Is the object where the servlet can store data it will send back
        filepath - The path to the file to send with the http response
        storeOnServer - Indicates if the file should be deleted after it is sent, or stored on server. Set to 'True' to keep on server and 'False' to delete.

      • deleteFile

        private void deleteFile(java.io.File file)
        Method uses java.nio.* library to delete a file (Files.delete(Path p)), purely for debugging purposes. One big difference of 'boolean File.delete()' and currently used 'void Files.delete(Path p)', is that when the latter fails, it will print a detailed error message instead of just true or false.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to delete from the system.

      • generatePdfPath

        public java.lang.String generatePdfPath(java.lang.String parentPath,
                                        java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        parentPath - The parent directory of the PDF.
        name - The unique number that will be used to generate this pdf's name.
        Returns:
        The path to this document.

      • generateCustomPdfPath

        public java.lang.String generateCustomPdfPath(java.lang.String parentPath,
                                              java.lang.String name,
                                              java.lang.String extension)
        Method will replace all whitespace or leading trail from name with the '_' sign
        Parameters:
        parentPath - The parent directory of the file.
        name - The name that the file will receive.
        extension - The file extension
        Returns:
        The full path to this file

      • createPdf

        public void createPdf(Invoice invoice,
                      java.lang.String filename)
        The method that creates the PDF document. If the pages must have a white background (default), just remove the addEvenHandler() line.
        Parameters:
        invoice - The invoice to model as a PDF file.
        filename - The path where the pdf file is going to be stored.

      • createUnicodeSupportedFont

        private PdfFont createUnicodeSupportedFont(java.lang.String filepath)
        This method will create a PdfFont that supports the Cyrillic Script.
        ( Windows-1251 8-bit character encoding ).
        Parameters:
        filepath - The .ttf file to use as the font.
        Returns:
        The PdfFont, using the .ttf file specified.

      • populateDocument

        private void populateDocument(Invoice invoice,
                              Document document,
                              PageSize pageSize)
                       throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        This method adds all the text and images to the document, while the document is open().
        Parameters:
        invoice - The invoice to get information from
        document - The document to add elements at ( i.e. text, images, watermarks, etc..)
        pageSize - An object of type PageSize, that holds dimensional information about the document's page(s).
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - thrown by Image-type objects

      • setFontToParagraphs

        private void setFontToParagraphs(PdfFont font,
                                 Paragraph... paragraphs)
        This method will add a specified font to a (variable) number of Paragraphs
        Parameters:
        font - The font to add to the paragraphs
        paragraphs - The number of paragraphs that will have their font changed.

      • getBoldElement

        private ListItem getBoldElement(java.lang.String withFont,
                                java.lang.String plainString)
        Parameters:
        withFont - the string with font applied to it, after being converted to Text first
        plainString - the string that will remain without font, to be added after the string with font.
        Returns:
        a ListItem-type object, that contains a sentence with 2 concatenated strings. The first string is always Bold and the second string is as-is.

      • defaultList

        private List defaultList()
        Returns:
        a new List() object, with no symbol in front of each element.

      • defaultParagraph

        private Paragraph defaultParagraph()
        Returns:
        a new Paragraph() object, but with smaller space left between this paragraph and the previous element. e.g. When the paragraph is inserted it will insert half the space that it was going to insert by default.
